statements: UPDATE savings_goal_notification SET current_balance = 1500.50 WHERE customer_id = 123 AND notification_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE savings_goal_notification SET is_notified = TRUE, goal_amount = 2000.75 WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE savings_goal_notification SET current_balance = current_balance + 1000 WHERE customer_id = 123 AND goal_amount > current_balance
UPDATE savings_goal_notification SET notification_date = '2023-01-15', is_notified = true WHERE customer_id = 456 AND current_balance <= goal_amount
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE notifications SET notification_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' , notification_text = 'New notification' WHERE notification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE notifications SET notification_text = 'New update notification', notification_time = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE notification_id = 'aabbccdd-1234-5678-90ab-cdef01234567';
UPDATE Customers SET savings_goal = 5000 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SavingsProgress SET current_savings = 10000, goal_reached = TRUE WHERE progress_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', savings_goal = 50000 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SavingsProgress SET current_savings = 20000, goal_reached = TRUE WHERE progress_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'Alice' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE SavingsProgress SET current_amount = 500.75 WHERE customer_id = 2 AND plan_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE SavingsProgress SET current_amount = current_amount + 1000 WHERE customer_id = 2 AND plan_id = 3;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE Customer SET email='jane.doe@example.com', customer_name='Jane Doe' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Customer SET email = 'jane.doe@example.com', customer_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE customer_id = 2;
